#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked
typedef long long int lld;
typedef unsigned long long llu;
typedef long int ld;
#define pb push_back

int  comp(const void *a,const void *b)
{ 
    return *(int*)a-*(int*)b;
}

void si(lld &x)
{  x=0;
    char c=gc();
    int neg=0;

    while((c<'0'|| c>'9') && c!='-')
        c=gc();

    if(c=='-') {neg=1; c=gc();}
    for(;c>='0' && c<='9';c=gc())
    { 
        x=x*10+c-48;            
    }

    if(neg==1)
         x=-x;
}


inline void pi(int n)
{
    int i=0;
    char ch[20];
    if(n<0)
        if(n==0) pc('0');
        else
            pc('-'),n=n*(-1);

    while(n>0)
    {  ch[i]=n%10 +'0';
        n=n/10;
        i++;
    }

    while(i>0)
    { 
        pc(ch[i-1]);
        i--;
    }
    pc(' ');
}

inline void ss(char *s)
{
     char ch;
     ch=gc();
     int i=0;
     while((ch>=32)&&(ch<=110))
     {
          s[i++]=ch;
          ch=gc();
     }

     s[i]='\0';
}

inline void ps(char *s)
{
     int i=0;
     while(s[i]>=32 && s[i]<=127)
     {
          pc(s[i]);
          i++;
     }
     pc('\n');
}

int main(){
     lld n,l,lo,lol,i,test,i1,ls;
     char a[1000100];

      si(test);

      for(i1=0;i1<test;i1++)
      {    l=0; lo=0;lol=0;
           ss(a);
           ls=strlen(a);

           for(i=0;i<ls;i++)
           {
                if(a[i]=='L')
                { 
                     l++;
                     lol+=lo;
                }
               else if(a[i]=='O')
                     lo+=l;
           }

           printf("%lld\n",lol);

      }
     return 0;
}
